document.full_text: grady sizemore sparked cleveland with his long awaited return to the field and the indians handed the baltimore orioles their seventh straight defeat with a 4-2 victory sunday.
document.title: sizemore makes return as indians top struggling orioles
lines_and_colors: grady sizemore sparked cleveland with his long awaited return to the field and the indians handed the baltimore orioles their seventh straight defeat with a 4-2 victory sunday.
